body:
I think the only thing I would add here is that prefixing the actions with `normandy-` would probably help with namespacing.

It's pretty important for us to get this done soon since there's a decent chance pref rollouts will overwhelm the data pipeline if we don't exclude them. @Osmose can you help us get this on the docket?

body_html:
I think the only thing I would add here is that prefixing the actions with normandy- would probably help with namespacing.

It's pretty important for us to get this done soon since there's a decent chance pref rollouts will overwhelm the data pipeline if we don't exclude them. @Osmose can you help us get this on the docket?
